content:
That's a great idea! I think my brother would really enjoy a sporting event or a concert. He's a big fan of our local basketball team, so tickets to a game would be a great gift. I'll definitely keep that in mind for future gifts.

Going back to my gift list, I was thinking of organizing it by occasion, like birthdays and holidays. Do you think that's a good way to approach it, or is there a better way to organize it?
